thread.title: Microsoft, Intel, PC Makers Join Forces to Bring a Windows 10 Computer on Every Desk - newsR
thread.title_full: Microsoft, Intel, PC Makers Join Forces to Bring a Windows 10 Computer on Every Desk - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft, Intel, PC Makers Join Forces to Bring a Windows 10 Computer on Every Desk - newsR
text: Microsoft, Intel and three of the largest PC manufacturers will join forces for a new advertising campaign supposed to promote the advantages of a new Windows 10 computer, as part of a broader attempt to help bring PC sales above the floating line. The campaign is not yet official, but Recode writes that an announcement is expected... Â»
